sentences.en: Ade couldn't relate the phenomena with any theory he knew.
sentences.cn: 艾德无法用他所知道的任何理论来解释这种现象.

sentences.en: Afternoon groups relate to the specific addictions and problems therein.
sentences.cn: 下午的小组谈到具体的上瘾病例以及其中的问题。

sentences.en: He is unable to relate to other people.
sentences.cn: 他无法理解他人的想法。

sentences.en: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.cn: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

sentences.en: His remarks didn't relate to the topic under discussion.
sentences.cn: 他说的话与讨论的问题无关.

sentences.en: I can't relate what he does with [ to ] what he says.
sentences.cn: 我没法把他做的和说的联系 起来.

sentences.en: I don’t understand how the two ideas relate.
sentences.cn: 我不明白这两个观点有什么联系。

sentences.en: I found it difficult to relate the two ideas in my mind.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很难把这两种想法联系在一起。

sentences.en: It is difficult to relate his argument to the facts.
sentences.cn: 很难把他的论证同事实联系起来.

sentences.en: It is difficult to relate these results with any known cause.
sentences.cn: 很难把结果与任何已知原因联系起来.

sentences.en: It's too bad that you are unable to relate to the environment.
sentences.cn: 你不能适应环境,这太糟糕了.

sentences.en: It's unfortunate when a father and son can't relate to each other.
sentences.cn: 父子之间关系不好是很不幸的.

sentences.en: Other recommendations relate to the details of how such data is stored.
sentences.cn: 其他建议涉及此类信息储存方面的一些细节。

sentences.en: Our findings relate to physically rather than the visually handicapped pupils.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究结果是关于肢体残疾的学生,而不是视力有障碍的学生.

sentences.en: The professor told his students to relate theory with practice.
sentences.cn: 教授要学生们理论联系实际.

sentences.en: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.cn: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.en: There were officials to whom he could relate the whole story.
sentences.cn: 有一些官员会听他讲述整个故事。

sentences.en: These people, usually men, seem unable to relate to the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 这些人，通常为男性，似乎不懂得如何跟异性相处。

trans.tran_en: to tell someone about events that have happened to you or to someone else

trans.tran_en: if two things relate, they are connected in some way
if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected
